      recursive subroutine seg_build(node, l, r, tree, n)
        integer, intent(in) :: node, l, r, n
        integer, dimension(4*n), intent(inout) :: tree
        integer :: mid
        if (l == r) then
            tree(node) = l   ! because active(l) is true initially
        else
            mid = (l+r)/2
            call seg_build(2*node, l, mid, tree, n)
            call seg_build(2*node+1, mid+1, r, tree, n)
            tree(node) = min(tree(2*node), tree(2*node+1))
        end if
      end subroutine

      recursive subroutine seg_update(node, l, r, idx, value, tree, n)
        integer, intent(in) :: node, l, r, idx, value, n
        integer, dimension(4*n), intent(inout) :: tree
        integer :: mid
        if (l == r) then
            tree(node) = value
        else
            mid = (l+r)/2
            if (idx <= mid) then
                call seg_update(2*node, l, mid, idx, value, tree, n)
            else
                call seg_update(2*node+1, mid+1, r, idx, value, tree, n)
            end if
            tree(node) = min(tree(2*node), tree(2*node+1))
        end if
      end subroutine

      function seg_query(node, l, r, ql, qr, tree, n) result(res)
        integer, intent(in) :: node, l, r, ql, qr, n
        integer, dimension(4*n), intent(in) :: tree
        integer :: mid, res
        ! If the current segment does not overlap with the query range, return BIG
        if (r < ql .or. l > qr) then
            res = BIG
        else if (ql <= l .and. r <= qr) then
            res = tree(node)
        else
            mid = (l+r)/2
            res = min( seg_query(2*node, l, mid, ql, qr, tree, n), &
                      seg_query(2*node+1, mid+1, r, ql, qr, tree, n) )
        end if
      end function

    end program
